title: XDM Business Account

xdm:accountNumber.title: Account Number
xdm:accountNumber.description: Tracking or reference number for account. Up to 40 characters are allowed in this field.

xdm:accountType.title: Account Type
xdm:accountType.description: Type of account, for example, customer, competitor, or partner. Entry is selected from a picklist of available values, which a salesforce admin sets. Each picklist value can have up to 40 characters.
